sent.orig: You shall go to a specialist in computer or to a computer specialist for advice.
sent.trans: 你应去计算机专营店或去找一个计算机专家咨询。

sent.orig: Two important sets of roles must be performed: task specialist and team maintenance specialist.
sent.trans: 两个重要的角色必须执行：任务专家角色和维持专家角色。

sent.orig: The company has appointed a turn-around specialist as the new CEO and may well survive.
sent.trans: 公司已任命一名扭亏转盈专家担任新的首席执行长并很可能会度过难关。

sent.orig: The specialist predicts international tension will build up.
sent.trans: 那位专家预测，国际的紧张局面将会升高。

sent.orig: The doctor referred the patient to a specialist.
sent.trans: 这位医生把病人转介绍给专门医生诊治。
